name: tsmvc
description: Allows usage of POTOs (Plain old TypeScript Objects) as models for data layer such as API resource.

scripts.dist: browserify lib --debug | exorcist lib/bundle.js.map > lib/bundle.js && uglifyjs lib/bundle.js --in-source-map lib/bundle.js.map --mangle --compress --output lib/bundle.min.js --source-map lib/bundle.min.js.map

author: David Mifsud
David Stellini
